attributes.title: Lara Croft VS Nathan Drake
attributes.caption: These two adventurers are here to prove once and for all who's the pivotal Playstation plunderer! Lara Croft the Tomb Raider and Nathan Drake the seeker of the uncharted!​
attributes.description: These two adventurers are here to prove once and for all who's the pivotal Playstation plunderer! Lara Croft the Tomb Raider and Nathan Drake the seeker of the uncharted! attributes.title: Scrooge McDuck vs Shovel Knight
attributes.caption: These two masters of adventure, wealth and Pogo sticking duke it out to see who would win a DEATH BATTLE!
attributes.description: These two masters of adventure, wealth and Pogo sticking duke it out to see who would win a DEATH BATTLE!  CREDITS  Wiz/Showrunner: Ben B. attributes.title: Venom VS Bane (Marvel VS DC Comics)
attributes.caption: One broke the bat. The other ruined the spider. Now they meet in the ring and only one will leave alive!
attributes.description: One broke the bat. The other ruined the spider. Now they meet in the ring and only one will leave alive!
attributes.display_title: Venom VS Bane (Marvel VS DC Comics)

attributes.title: Power Rangers VS Voltron
attributes.caption: Two teams. Two Robots. Only one survives in this special 75th episode of Death Battle!
attributes.description: Two teams. Two Robots. Only one survives in this special 75th episode of Death Battle!

attributes.title: Natsu VS Ace (Fairy Tail VS One Piece)
attributes.caption: These blazing contenders scorch the battlefield and only one will prove who's flame burns brighter!
attributes.description: These blazing contenders scorch the battlefield and only one will prove who's flame burns brighter!

attributes.title: Sub-Zero VS Glacius
attributes.caption: Two masters of ice and combat go head to head to see who's the coolest!

attributes.title: Android 18 VS Captain Marvel (Dragon Ball VS Marvel Comics)
attributes.caption: A battle of powerful blondes with devastating energy! Will the android who threatened the world win the day, or can Carol Danvers pull this one off?
attributes.description: A battle of powerful blondes with devastating energy! Will the android who threatened the world win the day, or can Carol Danvers pull this one off?

attributes.title: Metal Sonic VS Zero
attributes.caption: They're ultimate creations built for one purpose... to destroy! Which mechanical wonder will win this fight?
attributes.description: They're ultimate creations built for one purpose... to destroy! Which mechanical wonder will win this fight?  CREDITS  Wiz: Ben B. attributes.title: Lucario VS Renamon (Pokémon VS Digimon)
attributes.caption: The fast and the furriest! With the ultimate battle of the fox and the hound underway, which lone warrior has the inner strength to win a duel to the death?
attributes.description: The fast and the furriest! With the ultimate battle of the fox and the hound underway, which lone warrior has the inner strength to win a duel to the death?

attributes.title: Balrog vs TJ Combo (Street Fighter vs Killer Instinct)
attributes.caption: The battle of boxers! Two champion fighters enter the ring with the goal to win... at any cost. Only one will leave alive!
attributes.description: The battle of boxers! Two champion fighters enter the ring with the goal to win... at any cost. Only one will leave alive!

attributes.title: Shredder VS Silver Samurai (TMNT VS Marvel)
attributes.caption: It's the ninja master versus the honorable samurai! The ancient rivalry will be settled today when the Shredder takes on the Silver Samurai!

attributes.title: Smokey Bear VS McGruff the Crime Dog
attributes.caption: They've taught us about fire safety and crime prevention. Now it's time they teach us who's the superior public servant!
attributes.description:
They've taught us about fire safety and crime prevention. Now it's time they teach us who's the superior public servant! 





Animation by Blind Ferret Entertainment https://blindferret.com/Follow them on Twitter: https://twitter.com/BlindFerret























Help save lives from wildfires, hurricanes, and other disasters by donating to the American Red Cross here: http://www.redcross.org/about-us/our-work/disaster-relief

attributes.title: Thor VS Wonder Woman (Marvel VS DC Comics)
attributes.caption: It's Marvel vs DC in a gargantuan battle to the death! Between the mighty god of thunder and the tenacious Amazon princess, who will survive?
